Comment: Abilities: A0MS (Mirror Image), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Creates images of Hero to fight enemies and dispels all magic from Hero.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Creates 2 images which deal 20% the damage of Hero and take 200% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Creates 3 images which deal 20% the damage of Hero and take 200% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Creates 4 images which deal 20% the damage of Hero and take 200% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Creates 5 images which deal 20% the damage of Hero and take 200% the damage.
